column5: We offer a full service getaway. All twin beds, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, massage room, hot tub, swimming pool. We sit on 50 acres South East of Dallas. Just 30 miles to Canton First Monday Trade days. We have dedicated space for sewing, Scrapbooking, mixed media. (website hidden)  Mixed Media Art Retreat offering craft space  Swimming pool,hot tub, massage therapist  Daily during meal service- breakfast, lunch and dinner included.  Quiet, country  No public transportation  Full meal service included
